URLs

asyncproject URLs

URL configuration for asyncproject.

api URLs

api.urls.urlpatterns = [<URLPattern 'upload/' [name='file-upload']>, <URLPattern 'profile/' [name='profile-data']>, <URLPattern 'train/' [name='train-model']>, <URLPattern 'get_training_status/<uuid:file_id>/' [name='get_training_status']>, <URLPattern 'predict/' [name='predict']>, <URLPattern 'test/' [name='test-api']>, <URLPattern 'task_status/<str:task_id>/' [name='task-status']>, <URLPattern 'data_preview/' [name='data-preview']>, <URLPattern 'get_metadata/' [name='get-metadata']>, <URLPattern 'update_metadata/' [name='update-metadata']>, <URLPattern 'get_stored_metadata/' [name='get-stored-metadata']>, <URLPattern 'get_columns/' [name='get-columns']>]

URL Configuration

The urlpatterns list routes URLs to views. For more information please see:

https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/4.0/topics/http/urls/

Routes:
  • upload/:

    • Description: Uploads a file and returns metadata.

    • View: FileUploadView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: multipart/form-data

    • Response: JSON

  • profile/:

    • Description: Generates a profiling report for the uploaded data.

    • View: ProfileDataView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON

  • train/:

    • Description: Trains a model based on the uploaded data.

    • View: TrainModelView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON

  • get_training_status/<uuid:file_id>/:

    • Description: Retrieves the training status of the model.

    • View: GetTrainingStatusView

    • Method: GET

    • Response: JSON

  • predict/:

    • Description: Makes predictions based on the trained model.

    • View: PredictView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: multipart/form-data or JSON

    • Response: HTML

  • test/:

    • Description: A simple test endpoint to ensure the API is working.

    • View: TestView

    • Method: POST

    • Response: JSON

  • task_status/<str:task_id>/:

    • Description: Checks the status of a specific task.

    • View: TaskStatusView

    • Method: GET

    • Response: JSON

  • data_preview/:

    • Description: Provides a preview of the uploaded data.

    • View: DataPreviewView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON

  • get_metadata/:

    • Description: Fetches metadata of the uploaded data.

    • View: GetMetadataView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON

  • update_metadata/:

    • Description: Updates the metadata of the uploaded data.

    • View: UpdateMetadataView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON

  • get_stored_metadata/:

    • Description: Retrieves stored metadata of the uploaded data.

    • View: GetStoredMetadataView

    • Method: GET

    • Response: JSON

  • get_columns/:

    • Description: Retrieves the column names of the uploaded data.

    • View: ColumnListView

    • Method: POST

    • Request: JSON

    • Response: JSON
